metadata.description: Local development configuration with embedded AWS credentials
security_notes: ‚ö†Ô∏è  SECURITY WARNING: This file contains AWS credentials in plain text
üîí Only use this format for local development and testing
üö´ Never commit this file to version control
üîê For production, use IAM roles, profiles, or environment variables
üóëÔ∏è  Rotate credentials regularly and delete unused access keys
usage_instructions: 1. Replace example credentials with your actual AWS access keys
2. Ensure this file has restricted permissions (chmod 600)
3. Add this file to .gitignore to prevent accidental commits
4. Consider using AWS CLI profiles instead for better security
5. For CI/CD environments, use the accounts_cicd_environment.json format

credential_sources.temporary_credentials: Include session_token for STS temporary credentials
credential_sources.cross_account_roles: Use role_arn with management account credentials
credential_sources.mixed_authentication: Different accounts can use different auth methods
